author: By MEG KINNARD Associated Press
title: SC gov directs officials to release virus cases by ZIP code
description: COLUMBIA, S.C. (AP) — Gov. Henry McMaster has directed South Carolina's health department to begin publicly disclosing confirmed COVID-19 cases by ZIP code, a level of information specificity the agency had previously said was not necessary in efforts to temp…
